item.description:
Hi, Everybody:

Join us for a great Italian lunch / social at this popular restaurant located on Route One across from Scarborough Marsh! Check out their delicious menu on their web site:

http://www.anjons.com...

There is a good reason that they have been in business for 53 years

Please be sure that you will be able to join us before RSVPing, as reservations may be required if enough members sign up.

Look forward to seeing you at Anjons! Just send me a note if you need the directions.

Randy
RandyS@maine.rr.com
item.how_to_find_us: Look for a silver Subaru in the parking lot. After 11:50, we will be inside; ask for Randy's table.
item.name: Lunch at Anjons in Scarborough!
